body:
Hi Caremzim,

thank you for providing your script. I used it, got the following response:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29492654/27243811-3c6b626e-52d3-11e7-87f3-cf724085a2d1.png)

If I just try to import, I get this
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29492654/27243853-6f699122-52d3-11e7-95a4-121bc7908c40.png)

I have intalled cuda 7.5 with cudnn 5 on windows server 2012 r2. MS redistributable 2015 also installed.
Thanks a lot,

Blg
